Across the desk from the small man in the sharp suit was a mountain. Well, a man who was a mountain really. He was wider than the desk and taller than pretty much any other man. Huge, fat cheeks above a thick double- well, triple- chin framed the head as it sat atop broad shoulders. Those shoulders rested above two, gigantic pecs that were soft, flabby, and as big as some other sumo's bellies. The mountain sighed, "I understand."

"Good. Now, you're welcome to drop by anytime but BUZZ BUZZ BUZZ," the man said before an annoying alarm started to go off from his mouth.

Yoshi grunted and rubbed his eyes. His alarm had interrupted the dream he was having. Though it wasn't so bad really since it was the dream that replayed whenever he was truly exhausted and his mind wandered to the memory of being banned from professional sumo wrestling. He pulled the sheets off of his gargantuan gut and palmed the sides of it with a small smile. Who said Japanese guys were tiny and wiry office workers? His years at Maximus had been good to him. He had been gaining and training for sumo, but recently he'd been focusing on a new goal. He wanted to keep growing but stay mobile so he could become a record holder and show that sumo organization. After putting on a hundred pounds since being kicked out 9 months ago, he's gotten even closer to a ton.

He heaved himself onto his side as he tried to roll out of bed. Flopping onto his side, his belly spilled out before him and hung off the side of his custom sized bed while his constantly growing butt stuck out behind him. With a flex of his belly he grunted, and fired out a thick fart, expelling his morning gas loudly- a side effect of his high protein diet. After doing so, he swung one of his huge feet out from under him and planted it onto the floor with a thud. He pushed himself up a bit and rounded his other leg around to plant his other foot down, slowly raising up. There he stood at his full 7'7" height and 16' waist, ready to start the day.

He then thudded back to his bed and sat down, grunting again as he reached around to get his socks on. It was getting tougher and tougher to do the bigger he got, but Bear had been training him to be more flexible too so he could still do at least this. Sadly he still broke a sweat as he got one on and rested a bit before tugging the second on. Exhaling a bit he slipped his feet into his shoes, adjusted them, and then grunted as he pushed his mammoth body up.

Adjusting his shorts, he started to thunder out of his room, squeezing out sideways through the already wide door. He waddled down the even wider corridor, huge thuds echoing as he pushed his huge belly along, the massive blimp wobbling and leading his way. A few workers in the hall stepped against the walls to give him room, Yoshi holding a huge mitt up to wave to them as he pressed on. Thankfully his room was near the gym so it was only a short waddle to the huge, open doorway and big, glass windows.

Bear was already there, setting things up when he heard the huge thuds. He turned and smiled, his square, stubbled face beaming happily. Yoshi returned the smile and rumbled up in front of Bear.

"Hey, big man! Ready to get started? I think we'll do some weights and squats for now, then Hog's got breakfast ready," Bear said in his thick, gruff, but quite sweet voice.

"Sure am," Yoshi smiled as he and Bear went over to the weights section.

They warmed up a bit, did a few curls with dumbells that would make any jock grunt with effort, but for them it was nothing. They were perfectly in synch- Bear's huge arms bulging and relaxing as he curled the heavy weights while Yoshi did the same. Though with Yoshi, his fat arms tensed and relaxed, causing the flab to jiggle. The weight also followed the curve of the side of his belly as he curled, making his gut shake too.

The two worked up a decent sweat and then moved over to the bench. Bear had ordered a bench that could be connected to others to give Yoshi enough space to lay on. He had connected about 14 feet worth of bench, meaning the massive man still hung off the sides a bit. Though it didn't matter much as Yoshi eased onto it and spread his huge legs, getting comfortable despite the missing 2 feet. He lay back as Bear added weights to either side of the bar, filling it with enough to make even him put forth some effort.

"Ready?" Bear grunted as he got the last weight on.

"Ready," Yoshi said as he gripped the bar.

Bear started to spot Yoshi, standing over the man's huge head. He counted off reps as Yoshi pumped, monitoring how his arms flexed with each one. He loved how lazy Hog was, but he also loved how strong and active Yoshi was so for him, living at the center was a dream come true. Yoshi's forehead broke into a sweat, followed by square inch upon square inch of his body. His moobs and belly dripped sweat onto the bench, some pooling in his bellybutton and dampening his huge asscrack.

After several reps, Bear had Yoshi stop and cool down as he got a second bar ready. Yoshi panted and wiped down what he could of his body, but the sweat just kept coming in full force. Bear helped him up off of the bench and he lumbered over to the second bar, chest still heaving. He squatted down and grabbed the bar around his shoulders as Bear instructed him to do some squats. Yoshi did as he was told, rising up from his position to come back down slowly. He had his huge legs spread apart and was grunting deeply with effort as he squatted. His belly and ass pressed down into the gym mats, coating them in his sweat before he rose back up.

He kept going as Bear encouraged him, forcing him to work hard despite all the weight. On the last one, Yoshi went down and a thundering fart ripped from his giant ass. His cheeks were red, but mostly from exertion, having given up most of his modesty since joining up at Maximus. Bear just laughed and dramatically fanned the air while Yoshi let the bar fall and stood up.

"Damn, you ARE worse than Hog," Bear bellowed with laughter.

"You had me doing squats so this is your fault," laughed Yoshi.

Now...
151.title: Time to workout with Bear.

choices: start to nap, to digest better....
discuss what to have for lunch...
ask Bear and the dining room staff for belly rubs.
1511.content:
Yoshi set the bar back down, then stood up again, his legs hardly feeling his massive weight now that the hefty squat bar was not part of their load. Fairly bouncing his 1200 pounds on his toes, he goes to the shower at the side of the gym, strips off, and steps into the enormous shower enclosure - really, a glass-walled cubicle. Closing his eyes, he activates the shower - which is no ordinary shower, but more like an automated car wash for giant guys. Yoshi reaches down and grabs his gut, lifting it, then dropping it, letting the floor and wall mounted sprays clean even his gut overhang. He wiggles about, raising and lowering his vast arms, shifting his oil-barrel legs left and right, so that every square inch of flesh looses its layer of sweat and comes out clean. The shower, initially warm, slowly shifts to cool to cool him down, then the water ceases, and a cyclone of warm, dry air roars out of slots in the walls and ceilling. Once again, Yoshi elevates his generous gut to let his overlap be dried.

Stepping out of the shower, Yoshi picks up a pair of clean fleece shorts and a t-shirt with "Maximus Gain" stenciled across the gut region. Dropping heavily onto a nearby bench, Yoshi quickly dresses (as quickly as his fat allows), then climbs to his feet again. Meanwhile, Bear has showered as well, and donned his own shorts and muscle shirt. Bear's shirt is stencilled 'Hog Trainer" across his mountainous pecs, and "Maximus" stretches across his gluts on the shorts. The two fill the doorway, then rumbled along the broad hallway to the dining room, where Hog awaits them.

Looking fatter than ever, Hog sits in the dining room, stirring a vast pot of eggs. Spying Yoshi's gut preceding him into the dining room, Hog calls out, "You've come! I thought I'd starve to death, waiting!" He grins broadly and high-fives Bear, as the dining room waiters quickly take the lids off an acre of high-protein and high calorie foods for Yoshi, and a similar but much sweeter spread for Hog, suiting his sweet tooth. Bear picked up the vast pot of eggs, and dumped a large quanitity into each of three bowls, one for each of the three big men. Soon all three are deep into the vast breakfast. Bear finishes first, of course, then helps feed Hog the rest of his super-calorific repast.

Eventually sated, Hog and Yoshi burp loudly, then sit back, reclining to digest the thousands of calories they have just ingested. Many go to Yoshi's hard worked muscles (as do the calories of Bear's smaller repast), but Hog's intake goes to Hog's fat layers, mostly. Hog and Yoshi....
1511.title: Yoshi goes to eat breakfast with Hog

head off to the computer lab...
15112.content:
Eventually sated, Hog and Yoshi burp loudly, then sit back, reclining to digest the thousands of calories they have just ingested. Bear watches as the two vast guys lazily stroke their engorged guts.

After a minute or two, Hog looks up at Yoshi and says, "Well, that was decent. So, what should we have for lunch? I know I'll be hungry..."

Yoshi grins sleepily as Bear chuckles. "Hog, you're not hungry again?"

"Nah, but give him about fifteen minutes and he will be," Yoshi remarks, anticipating Hog's reply.

"As will you!" Hog ripostes. "So, about lunch...."

"Fish. Beef. Rice. Pie," Yoshi replies in a well-worn spiel.

"You two! Always thinking about food!" Bear teases, gently.

"Of course, how else did we get this big?" Hog asks in mock serious tones, as Yoshi nods.

"A sumo is only as good as his appetite," Yoshi observes, then leans back again.

151121.content:
After another half hour of sitting and digesting, Yoshi, Hog, and Bear flex their vast muscles to force their bellies skywards and clamber to their feet - Bear and Yoshi first, then Hog once he gets an assist from Hog. Then the magnificent trio head down a huge hallway, catching up slowly with Eldonia and Peter, who left the cafeteria moments ahead of them. The mammoth quintet reach a broad set of double doors, which Yoshi opens by ramming his gut into the them. Inside is a wide boardroom table, with wider chairs scattered around it, and at its head sits Richard Maximus III.

Moments after the four men seat themselves, and Eldonia parks her massive scooter, Dr. Martin, Alessandro and Martin hurry in. With Dr. Martin is a stranger, who tries hard to avoid rubbernecking at the sight of so many huge human beings.

"Welcome," rumbles Richard in a deep voice that suits his 2000 pounds frame. "Top of today's agenda is our visitor, James. He's a freelancer - National Geographic, NY Times, BBC - who specialises in unusual human stories, and he's asked to do a report on the clinic. Welcome James!"

"Thank you," James replies, his wonderment and amazement at his surroundings obvious.

"Now, none of you have to speak with James, and we get approval for any images he may want to take out of the clinic," Richard continued, "but I'd like you all to work with him - this could be a great opportunity to expand the work we do here. James, do you want to ask us a few questions as a group first?"

"Certainly," replied James. His gaze swept the room. "May I first ask each of you to respond to this question:
